code: @Override public void evaluate() throws Throwable {     WeldContainer container = weld.initialize().     context.setBeanManager(container.getBeanManager()).     try {         base.evaluate().     } finally {         container.shutdown().         context.unsetBeanManager().     } }

@Override public Statement apply(final Statement base, Description description) {     return new Statement() {          @Override         public void evaluate() throws Throwable {             WeldContainer container = weld.initialize().             context.setBeanManager(container.getBeanManager()).             try {                 base.evaluate().             } finally {                 container.shutdown().                 context.unsetBeanManager().             }         }     }. }
